description:
9:05 is a 'port' of the 2000 text adventure of the same name by Adam Cadre, created by me as a test of the Pulp system for Playdate when Pulp was released originally. It has no sound (due to a Pulp bug, the phone was supposed to ring), crummy graphics (yeah that one's my fault) and a small amount of the content that was originally in the text adventure was removed due to the translation from text to this, but the original game's spirit is still there, including the game's four endings.

It'll take you a couple of minutes to play through the game, but the multiple endings add a little more longevity. 

Otherwise, it's best you go in as blind as possible - I hope you didn't look at the Wikipedia page I linked up there.
